Post ODO.description: Odometer reading after the time of repair.

Warranty Type.description: Type of warranty under which the claim is made.

Symptom Code.description: Standardized code for the reported symptom.

Damage Code.description: Standardized code for the observed damage.

Related Parts.description: Alphanumeric part codes. Can have multiple entries.

Related Parts Quantity.description: Quantity for each related part. Can have multiple entries.

Repair Location.description: Location of failure/repair. Up to 3 locations can be specified.

Estimated Amount.description: Estimated monetary value of the claim in dollars.

Sublet Code.description: Code for sublet work. Can have multiple entries.

Sublet Amount.description: Monetary value for sublet work in dollars.

Prior ODO.description: Odometer reading before the time of repair.

Warrenty Status.description: Indicates if the claim is Accepted or Rejected.

ReasonCode.description: Reason for the warranty status. 'ACP' for Accepted, other codes for Rejected.
